controller

Class ViewCreateUpdateBoat

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ViewCreateUpdateBoat

  • public class ViewCreateUpdateBoat
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller class which handles and connects the Boats class in the view package with the model classes and the Database. This controller class contains methods for retreiving, updating, and creating boats from the database.
    Author:
    Mouayed Fakhreldin, Abdilrahman Duale, Genet Shiferaw

    • Method Detail

      • getBoatTypes

        public static java.lang.String[] getBoatTypes()
        Gets the available boat types.
        Returns:
        a String array of the boat types.

      • addBoat

        public static void addBoat(java.lang.String selectedPersonalNumber,
                           int typeChoice,
                           double length)
        Adds a boat to a member's boat list and stores in the database.
        Parameters:
        selectedPersonalNumber - The personal number of the owner of the boat
        typeChoice - The user's choice number for the boat type.
        length - The length of the boat (must be at least 1 meter).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if length is less than one.

      • getBoats

        public static java.lang.String[] getBoats(java.lang.String selectedPersonalNumber)
        Gets the list of boats registered for a certain member
        Parameters:
        selectedPersonalNumber - The personal number of the owner of the boats
        Returns:
        list of boats as a string array or null if the member does not own any boats. Each string represents a boat with the form: "id, type, length"

      • getBoatById

        public static java.lang.String getBoatById(int id)
        Gets a boat by ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the boat's ID
        Returns:
        the boat as a String or null if the boat has not been found. The boat string will be in the form of "id, type, length"

      • removeBoat

        public static boolean removeBoat(int id)
        Removes a boat from the database
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the boat to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the boat has been successfully removed, false otherwise.

      • updateBoatLength

        public static boolean updateBoatLength(int id,
                                       double newLength)
        Updates the length of a boat in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the boat to be updated
        newLength - The new length of the boat
        Returns:
        true if the boat has been successfully updated, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if length is less than one.

      • updateBoatType

        public static boolean updateBoatType(int id,
                                     java.lang.String type)
        Updates the boat type in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the boat to be updated
        type - Thye new type of the boat
        Returns:
        true if the boat has been successfully updated, false otherwise.
